SEARCH
Package p2p.java

Class BattleshipApp

java.lang.Object
p2p.java.BattleshipApp
public class BattleshipApp extends Object
Class that manages the network connection and game actions of a player in the battleship game. A BattleshipApp resides in each player's GUI application and is responsible for updating the state of the game for both players.
Since:
hw3

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    BattleshipApp.Mode
    Connection mode for this player, either client (this player connects to an opponent), or server (opponent is connecting to this player)

  • Field Details

    • USE_DEFAULT_PORT

      public static final int USE_DEFAULT_PORT
      If -1 is passed in as a port number to this class, the default port number will be used.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • BattleshipApp

      public BattleshipApp(int rows, int cols, int portNum, String peerIP)
      Initializes this BattleshipApp to a new game with specified dimensions, and establishes the connection based on port number, and IP address if specified.
      Parameters:
      rows - number of rows for the game.
      cols - number of columns for the game.
      portNum - port number.
      peerIP - should contain the enemy's IP address if this player is choosing to connect to an opponent, but can be null or empty if this player is choosing to wait for an opponent to join them.
      Since:
      hw3

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect() throws IOException
      Attempt connection to this BattleshipApp's peer.
      Throws:
      IOException - if connecting to the peer fails.
      Since:
      hw3

    • verifySameConfigs

      public boolean verifySameConfigs(int timer, List<Integer> ships)
      Asserts that this player and their peer have the same grid dimensions, timer, and ships after connection is established.
      Parameters:
      timer - this player's timer which will be checked against the other player's.
      ships - this player's list of ships which will be checked against the other player's.
      Returns:
      true if both players have the same configurations, false otherwise.
      Since:
      hw3

    • getMode

      public BattleshipApp.Mode getMode()
      Return the mode of this battleship app, either client or server.
      Returns:
      this client's mode.
      Since:
      hw3

    • getTurn

      public BattleshipProtocol.BattleshipStates getTurn()
      Return the current state of the battleship game; init, player1's turn, player2's turn, or finished.
      Returns:
      Current state of the battleship game.
      Since:
      hw3

    • getPlayer

      public String getPlayer()
      Return this player's player designation string (either player1 if this player is the server or player2 if this player is the client)
      Returns:
      player1 if this player is the server or player2 if this player is the client
      Since:
      hw3

    • shoot

      public int shoot(String player, int r, int c)
      Execute a shoot command for one of the players, based on the protocol state. Updates the state of the game based on if the shot won the player the game, and updates protocol state based on the result of the shot.
      Parameters:
      player - player who is shooting, either player1 or player2
      r - row index to shoot at
      c - column index to shoot at
      Returns:
      -1 if this shot didn't hit any enemy ship,
      1 if it hit an enemy ship but didn't sink it,
      2 if it hit an enemy ship and sank it,
      3 if it hit an enemy ship, sank it, and resulted in you winning the game.
      Since:
      hw3

    • receiveShot

      public int receiveShot()
      Receive and process a shoot command from the enemy via network.
      Returns:
      -1 if the received shot didn't hit any ships,
      1 if the received shot hit a ship but didn't sink it,
      2 if the received shot hit a ship and sunk it (including game-winning shots)
      0 if the enemy passed this turn.
      Since:
      hw3

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the game.
      Since:
      hw3

    • readyUp

      public boolean readyUp(boolean ready)
      Gets this player ready for the game and notifies the other player that they're ready, then waits for the other player to be ready, or vice-versa (waits for the other player to be ready then gets ready)
      Parameters:
      ready - true if this player is ready for the game, i.e. placed their ships down and ended their turn before time ran out, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true some player didn't ready up, false otherwise, i.e. both readied up.
      Since:
      hw3

    • sendPassCommand

      public void sendPassCommand()
      Sends a pass command to the opponent, signifying that this player didn't make a move in time.
      Since:
      hw3

    • placeShip

      public boolean placeShip(int l, int r, int c, String d)
      Place a ship.
      Parameters:
      l - length of ship
      r - row index of ship
      c - column index of ship
      d - direction of ship as a string, either vertical or horizontal
      Returns:
      true if a ship was successfully placed without conflict with an existing ship, false otherwise
      Since:
      hw3

    • removeShip

      public int removeShip(int r, int c)
      Removes a ship from the board at a specified location and returns its length, if a ship exists there.
      Parameters:
      r - row index of ship to remove
      c - column index of ship to remove
      Returns:
      length of the ship that was removed if there was a ship there, or -1 if there was not.
      Since:
      hw3

    • hitGridEntry

      public int hitGridEntry(int r, int c)
      Returns the entry in the hit grid at row r, column c
      Parameters:
      r - row index.
      c - column index.
      Returns:
      0 if this player has no information about enemy ships at row r, column c,
      -1 if this player knows the enemy has no ship at row r, column c via shooting,
      1 if this player knows the enemy has a ship at row r, column c via shooting at it,
      2 if this player knows the enemy has a ship at row r, column c that has been sunk.
      Since:
      hw3

    • shipData

      public int shipData(int r, int c)
      Returns information about this player's ship grid at row r, column c.
      Parameters:
      r - row index.
      c - column index.
      Returns:
      0 if this player has no ship at row r, column c, 1 if this player has a ship at row r, column c that has not been hit, 2 if this player has a ship at row r, column c that has been hit.
      Since:
      hw3

    • winner

      public boolean winner()
      After the game has ended, return information about whether this player won or not.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over and this player won, false otherwise.
      Since:
      hw3

    • loseDueToTimer

      public void loseDueToTimer()
      Immediately lose the game due to the timer running out.
      Since:
      hw3

    • vote

      public boolean vote(boolean restart)
      Execute a protocol command to vote for the game to restart or not, then wait for the other player to vote on restarting, or vice versa (wait then execute)
      Parameters:
      restart - true if this player has chosen to restart the game, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if the game was restarted, false otherwise.
      Since:
      hw3
